name: Escape from here
description:
This is an horror game located on an abandoned house, you are alone on it, and you have to go around the house and found all the secretes that hide on it.


What to expect:

-Graphics selector (for a variety of pc specs)

-Camera to make photos and a gallery with the photos stored on it

-Variety of rooms in the house

-Variety of scenaries in the house

-Hidden secrets and entrances in the house



How to play:

-WASD to move

-Space to jump

-Shift to run

-Left control to crouch

-Q to open/close door

-E to on/off camera

-R to take a shot

-R mouse to zoom camera
